00199 // protected methods
00200 
00201 inline i2d::CVector2d CPerspectiveCalibration::GetNormPosition(const i2d::CVector2d& viewPosition) const
00202 {
00203        return i2d::CVector2d(
00204                                    (viewPosition.GetX() - m_viewCenter.GetX()) * m_pixelAngleTangents.GetX(),
00205                                    (viewPosition.GetY() - m_viewCenter.GetY()) * m_pixelAngleTangents.GetY());
00206 }
00207 
00208 
00209 inline i2d::CVector2d CPerspectiveCalibration::GetViewPosition(const i2d::CVector2d& normPosition) const
00210 {
00211        return i2d::CVector2d(
00212                                    normPosition.GetX() / m_pixelAngleTangents.GetX() + m_viewCenter.GetX(),
00213                                    normPosition.GetY() / m_pixelAngleTangents.GetY() + m_viewCenter.GetY());
00214 }
